bio: I'm a dual major in Business Administration at Kenan-Flagler Business School and in Computer Science. My area of emphasis at Kenan-Flagler is in managerial consulting. I also work freelance developing websites, web applications, and backend engines.

experiences.title: Technology Development Analyst Intern
descriptions: Fully designed and developed an application to track production releases in the Shared Services Production Management team using AngularJS, ExpressJS, NodeJS, and SQL Server

Application increased productivity by substituting Excel spreadsheets with intuitive table interfaces and prepopulated forms, by providing a centralized storage for release data, and by reducing email clutter

experiences.title: Developer
descriptions: Developed university payroll analytics web application using AngularJS, Bootstrap, JavaServer Pages, and MySQL
Researched, wrote, and presented recommendation reports on potential technologies and services to be included into the application and/or development process
